markdownRemark.html:
• Sponsorship spots are open now! Please see the Sponsorship Prospectus for details

  • Key dates:

    • The conference will be July 27-28 at The Ohio Union in Columbus, OH
    • The CFP for talks and tutorials will open in late March or early April
    • Registration and t-shirt sales will open in late April
    • Volunteer sign-ups will open in April

  • Keep in touch:

    • Subscribe to our mailing list for major announcements
    • Follow us on Twitter
    • Join us on Slack for conversation
    • Contact us via email if you have any questions or would like to sponsor

frontmatter.title: Kicking off PyOhio 2019 Planning
frontmatter.description: Planning for PyOhio 2019 is under way!
